1.0.name: wordpress/google-1-social-button
1.0.description:
Google +1 (Social Button) is a social recommend plugin that let users recommend or +1 your content. The Google +1 plugin enable users to see how many users already +1 this page, and which of their friends recommend it too. The +1 button will influence your website's search ranking. Add Google +1 to your pages to help your site stand out.

Features

  • Easy installation and customization
  • Support for All 44 languages of Google +1 API Locales
  • Support live count
  • Quick loading time
  • Settings allows for the +1 button to be placed on pages, posts,or home page
